file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-12-06-04 - PEDAL ASSEMBLY LINING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PEDAL ASSEMBLY LINING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the pedal assembly lining. B. The pedal assembly is lined with two equal shrouds. They are attached with camloc fasteners and protected with four lateral strips. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-12-06-000-801-A PEDAL ASSEMBLY LINING - REMOVAL PEDAL ASSEMBLY LINING - INSTALLA- ALL 25-12-06-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-12-06 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PEDAL ASSEMBLY LINING - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the pedal assembly lining. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit RH/Cockpit LH H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (1) that attach the box assembly (2). (2) Loosen the camloc fasteners (3) that attach the pedal assembly shroud (4). (3) Lift and pull the forward pedal assembly shroud to remove the aft pedal assembly shroud (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-06 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Pedal Assembly Lining - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 223 224 B DET. A 4. SHROUD 1. SCREW 2. BOX 3. CAMLOC FASTENER DET. B 145AMM250006.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-06 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PEDAL ASSEMBLY LINING - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the pedal assembly lining. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit RH/Cockpit LH H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Fit the aft pedal assembly shroud (4) into the floor panel and make sure that the camloc fasteners (3) are in the correct position for installation. (2) Attach the box assembly (2) with the screws (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-12-06 Page 4 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
